mapper.select: SELECT SID, RANK, SONGTITLE, ARTIST, THUMBNAIL, DURATION, VIEWCOUNT, URL, RELEASEDATE, CHARTMONTH FROM SONG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SONG(SID, RANK, SONGTITLE, ARTIST, THUMBNAIL, DURATION, VIEWCOUNT, URL, RELEASEDATE, CHARTMONTH) VALUES (SONG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rank}, #{songTitle}, #{artist}, #{thumbnail}, #{duration}, #{viewCount}, #{url}, #{releaseDate}, #{chartMonth})
